Pre-Game Insights: Craig Bellamy has come through his coaching career alongside Vincent Kompany and he has also himself expressed a desire to play football in a progressive way with an emphasis on what would be a passing style of football.
Turkey showed themselves to be the entertainers of Europe this summer so that may well benefit them with their attackers going the other way.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Cardiff City Stadium.
The kick-off date/time is Friday 6th September, 2024 - UK – 7:45pm / US ET – 2:45pm / US PT – 11:45am.
The match will be broadcast on UK – S4C / US – FOX Sports.
The match will also be available to stream online on UK – BBC iPlayer or S4C Online / US – FOX Sports streaming platforms.
Others: Craig Bellamy is the new manager of Wales, replacing Rob Page.
Vincenzo Montella is the manager of Turkey.
Aaron Ramsey remains captain of Wales.
Chris Mepham is an injury concern for Wales.
Merih Demiral is suspended for Turkey.
Hakan Calhanoglu and Semih Kilicsoy are injury concerns for Turkey.
Ferdi Kadioglu is also out injured.
